trial_info.title: Glucomannan for the Treatment of Abdominal Pain-related Functional Gastrointestinal Disorders in Childhood
trial_info.brief_summary: Background: Functional abdominal pain disorders (FAPD) are common in school-aged children; however, there is no reliable treatment.~Aim: To determine the efficacy and safety of glucomannan for treating FAPD in children.~Trial Setting: Department of Pediatrics, The Medical University of Warsaw.~Intervention: Patients will be enrolled in a double-blind, randomized controlled trial in which they will receive either glucomannan (10g) or placebo for 4 weeks.
